message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. I understand its significance and would like to offer it to you at a special price. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I propose to sell the product to you for $750,000. This is a generous offer, allowing you to secure this valuable item while saving $50,000 compared to its full worth. I believe this is a fair deal that respects both our interests. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
